intro: Psychotria sadebeckiana, commonly known as the Sadebeck's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in botanical and pharmacological research.
